channel.title: Iason Svoronos - Kanavas
channel.description: Recent content on Iason Svoronos - Kanavas

item.title: Personal Website
item.description: Bio Iason Svoronos - Kanavas is a Master of Science by Research student in Computer Science and Informatics at the Applied Psychoacoustics Lab (APL), School of Computing & Engineering, University of Huddersfield, UK. He has a background in audio engineering (BSc, Ionian University, GR) and sonification, the process of mapping data onto non-speech sound for the purpose of enhancing perception and understanding. Under the supervision of Prof. Hyunkook Lee, the research project Soni-Cross, focuses on the design, development, and evaluation of a proposed Acoustic Vehicle Alerting System (AVAS) model.
